EmailTemplate.name: TFS: TFS Initiated Support Request Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Toyota Financial Services Support Request Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact}:
Thank you for being a valued customer. We have created a Support Request which includes the information you recently requested. To access your secure message in the Support Center please go to ToyotaFinancial.com and register or log into your account.
What information do I need to register my account online?
- First Name - Last Name - TFS Account Number (do not include any spaces or dashes) - Last 4 digits of Social Security Number - Username and Confirm Username - Choose a Password and Confirm Password - Email address for account management - Choose 3 Security Questions - Answer each Security Question - Click Submit at the bottom of the page
Already registered but need to add a vehicle?
- Login to ToyotaFinancial.com with your username and password - Answer your security question - Go to Add 'Another Vehicle' on the Account Overview page - Enter your account number (do not include any spaces or dashes) - Enter the last 4 digits of your Social Security Number - Click Submit
How do I retrieve my secure message in the Support Center?
Please follow these instructions to view your messages:
- Select 'Support Center Inbox' link on the left side of the web page - Click on Support Request {!Case.CaseNumber} to see the message
We value your business and look forward to serving your needs. Thank you for visiting us at ToyotaFinancial.com.
Sincerely, Toyota Financial Services Customer Support
This is a no reply email notification. Replies initiated from this email will neither be delivered nor answered. If you have additional questions, please log in to the Support Center for further assistance.
